item.title: Working on attacking, THE RIGHT WAY. Just Updated
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

If(playerIsAttacked == true && playerRights <=2) { Disconnected = true; Player.Handler.messageToAll = "Do not attack admins or you will be disconnected just like "+playerName+" did"; }

just to be clear about what was changed…

txt4 makes it so that the text appears above the players head as though they were saying it… also +playername+ is case sensitve so it needs to be changed to this +playerName+… and last thing when you add the +playerName+ there needs to be quotes around it as i did like this “+playerName+”… oh and when you add the text around it put the space after the quote…

metal

item.title: Working on attacking, THE RIGHT WAY. Just Updated
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I have ben working on getting the attacking how it is on runescape, you hit, they hit, you… etc. so all i really got for right now is this

and i want someone to tell me if this will work? its to make admins not attackable.

If(playerIsAttacked == true && playerRights <=2)
{
Disconnected = true;
Player.Handler.messageToAll = "Do not attack admins or you will be disconnected just like "+playerName+" did";
}

and my attacking, that this whole topic was mainly about.

f (playerIsAttacked == true) 
{
attackBack == true;
}

} else {
If(playerIsDead == true) 
{
Disconnection == false;
teleToX;
teleToY;
}

and this, to stop massing

if(sameclick == 3)
sendMessage("Kicked for clicking to fast!");
misc.println(playerName+" is clicking to fast and has been disconnected");
disconnected = true;
}

i just now hand wrote these, i thought of them while i was at school.

tell me the errors please.

thanks.

Frell

Read full topic
